description: Get the logs for a specified container instance in a specified resource group and container group.

container_name.description: The name of the container instance.

tail.description: The number of lines to show from the tail of the container instance log. If not provided, all available logs are shown up to 4mb.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

container_group_name.description: The name of the container group.
